subject: Women and Girls
Soccer
Stadiums and Arenas
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: The Olympic match between the United States and North Korea will be the first ever women’s international contest at the famed 102-year-old stadium, home of Manchester United.
snippet: The Olympic match between the United States and North Korea will be the first ever women’s international contest at the famed 102-year-old stadium, home of Manchester United.
